data.eml:eml: Rediscovery and amended descriptions of Begonia kingdon-wardii (Begoniaceae) from North Myanmar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Wen-Hong, Jin, Xiao-Hua, Shui, Yu-Min (2018): Rediscovery and amended descriptions of Begonia kingdon-wardii (Begoniaceae) from North Myanmar. PhytoKeys 94: 59-64, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.94.21753, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.94.21753
